Package example.membership

Interface Summary
Action  
CookieBackedServiceData Interface for service types that wish to have all or part of its persistent data cached in a browser cookie in order to minimize server requests.
MembershipSettings  
RegistrationFormHandler An interface for classes that can validate a site registration form and write data from a successful registration to the site user data content.
ServiceDataCookieHandler Handles reading service data from the "data"-cookie, see the implementing class.
UserDataHandler Handling of user data, see implementing class for details.
UserHandler
